column1: #Text=Thirteen Israeli soldiers , scores of Palestinians killed in deadly day of fighting in Gaza Strip
#Text=On Sunday , in the deadliest day of fighting for the Israeli military in several years , thirteen Israeli soldiers were reported killed in the Gaza Strip .
#Text=Over 500 deaths of Palestinians have been reported in the Gaza Strip in the now-fourteen days of Israel 's offensive against Hamas .

#Text=Over 67 deaths of Palestinians on Sunday , by one report well over 100 — both civilians and fighters combined — occurred in one area , the Gaza City suburb of Shujai'iya , following heavy fighting and shelling by Israeli forces .
#Text=Meanwhile , thirteen Israeli soldiers were killed Sunday , including two soldiers who were United States citizens .

#Text=Furthermore , the armed wing of Hamas claimed in a statement , " We have captured a Zionist soldier and the occupation has not admitted that " , and displaying a identification card and a serial number .

#Text=A anonymous senior Israeli military source told The Guardian in regards to Hamas fighters , " We have to admit we were facing good fighters , very well equipped with sophisticated weapons systems , accurate weapons , heavy weapons including mortars , booby traps .

#Text=United Nations Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon , who is in Doha , Qatar meeting with Qatar 's Emir Sheikh Tamim bin Hamad al-Thani and Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas , said in a statement ,  As I travel the region , I will continue to press for an [ immediate ] ceasefire — an immediate end to the Israeli military operation in Gaza and the rocket fire by Hamas and Islamic Jihad " .

column1: #Text=Ban criticized Israel for the civilian death toll saying , “ While I was en route to Doha , dozens more civilians , including children , have been killed in Israeli military strikes in the Shejaiyah neighborhood in Gaza[ ... ]
#Text=Israel must exercise maximum restraint and do far more to protect civilians . ”
#Text=In response , Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said in press conference , " We will continue this operation for as long as it takes .
